subject: Order #SSN5601
description_text:
Hello to whom it may concern,

Please make sure to send my order to: 40 Radiant Loop, Dayton WA 6055.
Australia

It added a business name of Amano Florals by accident, as I made an order
with that business before using my shop account.

Kind regards,
Sean Pelias

conversations.body_text: Hi Sean Pelias,    Okay, I've updated the correct address for you.
